DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate effectiveness two dose level topiramate ( 400 600 milligrams/day ) compare placebo treatment acute manic mixed episodes patient Bipolar I Disorder . The trial consist 3 phase : screening period ; double-blind treatment 12 week ; optional open-label period least 6 month . Assessment effectiveness include change baseline Day 21 Young Mania Rating Scale ( YMRS ) total score . Also include 12 week study Global Assessment Scale ( GAS ) , Montgomery-Ã…sberg Depression Rating Scale ( MADRS ) , Brief Psychiatric Rating Scale ( BPRS ) , Clinical Global Impressions ( CGI ) , health-related quality life measure specify time interval . Safety assessment include evaluation adverse event , rate withdrawal study due adverse event , vital sign ( blood pressure pulse ) throughout study , well change clinical laboratory test ( hematology , biochemistry , urinalysis ) , electrocardiogram ( ECGs ) , physical examination specify time . The study hypothesis change baseline Young Mania Rating Scale ( YMSR ) total score Day 21 significantly good topiramate group placebo group . Topiramate tablet ( 50 100 milligram ) placebo , begin 50mg daily increase first week maximum 400mg/day 600mg/day , depend study group . Maximum dosage continue 12 week . Dosage decrease increase investigator 's discretion .
